about_the_game:
We would like to introduce you to Steampunk Hearse - another beautiful artwork from the Polish illustrator Elwira Pawlikowska. This illustration is part of our Steampunk Visions collection by that author, so make sure to check out the rest of the puzzle boxes in it.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, 2500, 3000, and 4000 puzzle tiles. The UHD image captures the original illustration in great detail and you will be able to observe even the finest of details exactly as the artist has painted them on the canvas. The puzzle is of low difficulty, making it suitable for beginners and or players looking for a non-challenging playthrough. There are quite a lot of very distinct elements and no uniform areas at all, which should help you reconstruct the full image without too much trouble. Of course, if you find it too easy, you can always give it a try with a higher number of puzzle tiles.
detailed_description:
We would like to introduce you to Steampunk Hearse - another beautiful artwork from the Polish illustrator Elwira Pawlikowska. This illustration is part of our Steampunk Visions collection by that author, so make sure to check out the rest of the puzzle boxes in it.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, 2500, 3000, and 4000 puzzle tiles. The UHD image captures the original illustration in great detail and you will be able to observe even the finest of details exactly as the artist has painted them on the canvas. The puzzle is of low difficulty, making it suitable for beginners and or players looking for a non-challenging playthrough. There are quite a lot of very distinct elements and no uniform areas at all, which should help you reconstruct the full image without too much trouble. Of course, if you find it too easy, you can always give it a try with a higher number of puzzle tiles.

  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 720p Capable Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 133 MB available space
